definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Acadia and Bian are interviewing the village's bare-foot-doctor Xie Huizhi.
sentences.chinese: 安家怡和邊老師正在採訪村裏的赤腳醫生謝惠芝。

sentences.english: The doctor has a way to treat gonorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 這位赤腳醫生有治療白濁的偏方。

sentences.english: Village doctors before 1985 referred to barefoot doctors.
sentences.chinese: 1985年以前的鄉村醫生系赤腳醫生。

sentences.english: She is a doctor of traditional Chinese medicine.
